bulk_objects module¶

class bulk_objects.BrillouinZone(rlattvec: numpy.array)¶

Bases: object

An object which holds information for the Brillioun Zone. This is the Wigner–Seitz cell of the reciprocal lattice.

class bulk_objects.FermiSurface(bs: pymatgen.electronic_structure.bandstructure.BandStructure, hdims: list, rlattvec, mu: float = 0, soc: bool = False, doping=None, plot_wigner_seitz=False)¶

Bases: object

An object which holds information relevent to the Fermi Surface. It only stores information at k-space points where energy(K) == fermi energy

Bases: bulk_objects.FermiSurface

slice_data(bs, slice_plane: tuple)¶
class bulk_objects.RecipCell(rlattvec: numpy.array)¶

Bases: object

An object which holds information for the reciprocal cell. The reciprocal cell is the paralellopiped formed by the vector set (b1, b2, b3) and contains all the same information as the Brillouin Zone.

bulk_objects.plane_dist(slice_plane, vertex)¶
